biotools.summary:
Graphical genotyping on genetic and sequence-based maps.

GenoTypeMapper (GTM) is a software to compare, visualize and analyze genomic data of one or two genetic or physical maps. More information about the software can be obtained by reading the corresponding article, which is a prerequisite to understand the idea and theoretical background of this software. GTM is available for download, together with a small manual and testdata.
